description.zh-cn: 新加坡历史最悠久的学校，是新加坡最顶尖的学校之一，由斯坦福·莱佛士爵士于1823年创办。培养了包括李光耀和吴作栋在内的众多新加坡政商界人士。
description.en: The oldest school in Singapore and one of its top institutions, founded in 1823 by Sir Stamford Raffles. It has educated many prominent figures in Singapore's politics and business, including Lee Kuan Yew and Goh Chok Tong.

description.zh-cn: 英国政治家，现代新加坡的开埠者，莱佛士书院的创办人。
description.en: A British statesman, founder of modern Singapore, and the founder of Raffles Institution.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡政治家，首任新加坡总理，莱佛士书院的知名校友。
description.en: Singaporean politician, the first Prime Minister of Singapore, and a notable alumnus of Raffles Institution.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡政治家，第二任新加坡总理，莱佛士书院的知名校友。
description.en: Singaporean politician, the second Prime Minister of Singapore, and a notable alumnus of Raffles Institution.

description.zh-cn: 与莱佛士书院、莱佛士初级学院合称为“莱佛士家族”的女子中学。其前身为1844年成立的莱佛士书院女生部。
description.en: A girls' school known as part of the 'Raffles family' along with Raffles Institution and Raffles Junior College. Its predecessor was the girls' department of Raffles Institution, established in 1844.

description.zh-cn: 原为莱佛士书院的高中部，后独立为两年制高中，并于2009年与莱佛士书院在行政上合并。
description.en: Formerly the high school section of Raffles Institution, it became an independent two-year junior college and administratively merged with Raffles Institution in 2009.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次世界大战期间占领新加坡的国家，其军队曾征用莱佛士书院为军营。
description.en: The country that occupied Singapore during World War II, whose army commandeered Raffles Institution as a military barracks.

description.zh-cn: 一所新加坡学校，曾在二战后借出部分校舍给莱佛士书院复学。
description.en: A school in Singapore that lent part of its campus to Raffles Institution to resume classes after WWII.

description.zh-cn: 莱佛士书院的首位校长。
description.en: The first Headmaster of Raffles Institution.

description.zh-cn: 其殖民地官员斯坦福·莱佛士创办了莱佛士书院，其公学模式对书院有深远影响。
description.en: Its colonial officer, Stamford Raffles, founded Raffles Institution, and its public school model had a profound influence on the institution.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡的政府部门，莱佛士书院为其管辖下的一所政府中学。
description.en: A ministry of the Singapore government under whose jurisdiction Raffles Institution operates as a government secondary school.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡报纸，曾在1992年将莱佛士书院评为新加坡最好的中学。
description.en: A Singaporean newspaper that rated Raffles Institution as the best secondary school in Singapore in 1992.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡的国家图书馆，其起源可追溯到莱佛士书院的图书馆。
description.en: The national library of Singapore, which originated from the library of Raffles Institution.

description.zh-cn: 于1923年莱佛士书院百年庆之际，与宋旺相爵士共同建成其图书馆。
description.en: Co-established the library of Raffles Institution with Sir Song Ong Siang in 1923 during its centennial celebration.

description.zh-cn: 于1923年莱佛士书院百年庆之际，与林文庆先生共同建成其图书馆。
description.en: Co-established the library of Raffles Institution with Mr. Lim Boon Keng in 1923 during its centennial celebration.

description.zh-cn: 一项新加坡教育课程，使学生可以不必参加中学会考直接进入两年制高中学习。
description.en: An educational program in Singapore that allows students to bypass the GCE 'O' Level examination and proceed directly to junior college.

description.zh-cn: 斯坦福·莱佛士爵士于1823年6月5日创办了莱佛士书院。
description.en: Sir Stamford Raffles founded Raffles Institution on June 5, 1823.

description.zh-cn: 李光耀是莱佛士书院的校友，后来成为新加坡的首任总理。
description.en: Lee Kuan Yew was an alumnus of Raffles Institution and later became the first Prime Minister of Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 吴作栋是莱佛士书院的校友，后来成为新加坡的第二任总理。
description.en: Goh Chok Tong was an alumnus of Raffles Institution and later became the second Prime Minister of Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 莱佛士书院与莱佛士女子中学和莱佛士初级学院被合称为“莱佛士家族”，共享校歌、校徽和校训。莱佛士女中的前身是莱佛士书院于1844年成立的女生部。
description.en: Raffles Institution, Raffles Girls' School, and Raffles Junior College are collectively known as the 'Raffles family,' sharing a common school song, crest, and motto. The predecessor of Raffles Girls' School was the girls' department of Raffles Institution, established in 1844.

description.zh-cn: 莱佛士书院与莱佛士初级学院和莱佛士女子中学被合称为“莱佛士家族”，共享校歌、校徽和校训。
description.en: Raffles Institution, Raffles Junior College, and Raffles Girls' School are collectively known as the 'Raffles family,' sharing a common school song, crest, and motto.

description.zh-cn: 1981年，莱佛士书院的高中部被分拆出来组建了莱佛士初级学院。
description.en: In 1981, the high school section of Raffles Institution was split off to form Raffles Junior College.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡教育部于2008年10月3日批准了莱佛士书院与莱佛士初级学院的合并请求，合并于2009年1月1日生效。
description.en: On October 3, 2008, the Singapore Ministry of Education approved the merger proposal of Raffles Institution and Raffles Junior College, which took effect on January 1, 2009.

description.zh-cn: 1942年新加坡被日军占领后，莱佛士书院被征用为日本军营，导致学校无法正常运作。
description.en: After the Japanese occupation of Singapore in 1942, Raffles Institution was commandeered as a military barracks, preventing the school from operating normally.

description.zh-cn: 二战结束后，圣若瑟书院借用其部分校舍，帮助莱佛士书院于1945年11月8日复学。
description.en: After World War II, St. Joseph's Institution lent part of its campus to help Raffles Institution resume classes on November 8, 1945.

description.zh-cn: 1837年，J·H·摩尔成为莱佛士书院的首位校长。
description.en: In 1837, J. H. Moor became the first Headmaster of Raffles Institution.

description.zh-cn: 莱佛士书院由英国人创办，并仿照英国公学模式办学。
description.en: Raffles Institution was founded by a Briton and was modeled after British public schools.

description.zh-cn: 莱佛士书院是新加坡教育部管辖下的一所政府中学。
description.en: Raffles Institution is a government secondary school under the jurisdiction of the Singapore Ministry of Education.

description.zh-cn: 1992年，新加坡《海峡时报》将莱佛士书院评为新加坡最好的中学。
description.en: In 1992, Singapore's 'The Straits Times' named Raffles Institution the best secondary school in Singapore.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡国家图书馆起源于莱佛士书院的图书馆。
description.en: The National Library of Singapore originated from the library of Raffles Institution.

description.zh-cn: 于1923年，莱佛士书院百年校庆之际，与宋旺相爵士共同建成了学校图书馆。
description.en: In 1923, during the school's centennial, he co-established the school library with Sir Song Ong Siang.

description.zh-cn: 于1923年，莱佛士书院百年校庆之际，与林文庆先生共同建成了学校图书馆。
description.en: In 1923, during the school's centennial, he co-established the school library with Mr. Lim Boon Keng.

description.zh-cn: 莱佛士书院与莱佛士女子中学、莱佛士初级学院共同开设直通车课程（莱佛士课程）。
description.en: Raffles Institution, along with Raffles Girls' School and Raffles Junior College, offers the Integrated Programme (Raffles Programme).

description.zh-cn: 于1994年3月25日为莱佛士书院宿舍综合体奠基。
description.en: Laid the foundation stone for the Raffles Institution boarding complex on March 25, 1994.
